RocketCrafting Projects

Use Unreal engine to create classic 2d context applications. Similar to the standard web application. Rocket is most powerfull cross platform tool i need to use it. 4.24 version is most interest checkpoint for UE. Last version with opengles 2.0 devices support (mobile). Also is version where we use new feature exstension HTML5 build. Explanation: with opengles 2.0 we can still build our application for old android os. In other way 4.24 is one of the last releases.
